comments.body: Note: this is the equivalent to [`def hole[T]`](https://github.com/lampepfl/dotty/pull/6042/files#diff-c60b7bdb36081577552ac360877d74ebR22) in #6042, not to be confused with [`object patternHole { def unapply[T] = ... }`](https://github.com/lampepfl/dotty/pull/6042/files#diff-c60b7bdb36081577552ac360877d74ebR26).
